item.title: ps_checkpayment - Configure basic informations
item.description: ps_checkpayment - Configure basic informations Details Component : ps_checkpayment Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-609 Steps Step Description Expected result Click on Configure in modules -> Modules manager Configuration page should be displayed Add a company name, an address and save Information should be saved
